## Components
A theoretical database of defect or impurity formation enthalpies and energy levels generated by machine learning models trained from Density-functional theory (DFT) data.

**Input Descriptors:** (Generated by DFT data)
* Period
* Group
* Site
* &Delta; Ion. Rad.
* &Delta; At. Wt.
* &Delta; Cov. Rad.
* &Delta; Ion. En.
* &Delta; At. Rad.
* &Delta; EA
* &Delta; EN
* &Delta; At. Num.
* &Delta; Val.
* \# Cd Neighbors
* \# Te Neighbors
* Corrected VBM (eV)
* Corrected CBM (eV)
* &Delta;H(Cd-rich)
* &Delta;H(Mod)
* &Delta;H(Te-rich)


**Output Data:** (Trained by machine learning model)
* &Delta;H(Cd-rich)
* &Delta;H(Te-rich)
* (+2/+1)
* (+1/0)
* (0/-1)
* (-1/-2)
